name: Affirmation Plaque- Reverence
description: The Affirmation Series is based on the belief that our thoughts have creative power. By picturing, naming, and pondering a positive quality we help to create this quality in ourselves and the world.  The Series consists of forty-two miniatures painted by Kate with gouache, then scanned and printed with archival inks on fine paper, and framed under glass with a hand-soldered, copper frame.  Each of the regular size prints are signed by hand; the smaller ones are unsigned.  The regular size overall is 4.25" x 5.5" and the smaller version is 2.5" x 3.25".  Both sizes have hooks attached as shown.  More designs to come.
